name: ARPB_TX_FIN_ASST
description: Financial Assistance Related Items for Transactions. This table has information that is populated by financial assistance workflows.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: The financial assistance program applied on this charge line.

columns.name: PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the financial assistance program record.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_PCT
columns.description: The discount percentage applied to this charge line from financial assistance.

columns.name: FLAT_FEE_AMT
columns.description: The applied flat fee for this charge line from financial assistance.

columns.name: MIN_FEE_AMT
columns.description: The applied minimum fee on this charge line from financial assistance.

columns.name: FEE_SCHEDULE_ID
columns.description: The fee schedule on this charge line used to determine the financial assistance discount amount.

columns.name: FEE_SCHEDULE_ID_FEE_SCHEDULE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each fee schedule.

columns.name: DISCOUNT_AMT
columns.description: The discount amount from financial assistance calculations.

columns.name: FPL_PCT
columns.description: The Federal Poverty Level (FPL) percentage used in financial assistance calculations.
